cause.description:
The Vision of Children Foundation is a 501 (c)(3) nonprofit organization that focuses on funding research as well as supporting education and outreach services for rare genetic vision disorders. The Foundation was established in 1991 by Samuel A. Hardage, Chairman & CEO of Woodfin Suites Hotels, and his wife, Vivian after their son was born with Ocular Albinism, a genetically-caused, visually debilitating condition. Recognizing that there was no research being directed at curing this condition or minimizing its impact, the Hardage family and the Vision of Children Foundation set out to find a cure for Ocular Albinism and other hereditary vision disorders.
Please visit www.visionofchildren.org for more information about our Foundation, to become one of our Family Network Members, or to get more of your questions answered!
1. A cure is waiting to be found for hereditary vision disorders!
cause.mission: Our mission is to cure hereditary childhood blindness and vision disorders, and to improve the quality of life of visually-impaired individuals and their families.
